articles.author: Lily Hay Newman
articles.title: $1 phone scanner finds seven Pegasus spyware infections - Ars Technica
articles.description: The mobile device security firm iVerify has been offering a tool since May that makes spyware scanning accessible to anyone—and it’s already turning up victims.
articles.content: In recent years, commercial spyware has been deployed by more actors against a wider range of victims, but the prevailing narrative has still been that the malware is used in targeted attacks against… [+4899 chars]
